title: PRO-X Stainless Steel 15.5 in. Slotted Spatula
description: Designed with professional chefs in mind, this PRO-X cookware line is made of high-grade stainless steel and designed for high functionality in the kitchen. The PRO-X 15.5 in. slotted spatula has an extra long handle and is 100 percent solid 18/10 stainless steel from top to bottom. Plus, it makes an excellent cooking tool for outdoor grilling.Extra long handle makes it easy for you to gripSlotted spatula allows you to separate excess liquids easilyLoop at edge of handle prevents utensil from sliding inside a pot and provides the option to hang when storedDishwasher safe
